description: NTS Map: 082E06The lower trail just below "Trail Name: Peat Bog". Carmi cross country ski trails area.Trail circuit has a great view of Christie Mtn. Nice clearing at the viewpoint lots of direct sun for you sun buffs.Bike shop / rentals: Freedom Bike Shop Accomodations: Summerland Resort
directions: Take Carmi Ave off Main Street in Penticton. Pass the hospital then follow the signs up past the Penticton Race track. You will pass the race track and head towards the Lost Moose Lodge, over the cattle guard on to gravel road. (N49 27.728 W119 28.258 1219m)Take this until you arrive at the ski area parking lot. PARKING LOT:(N49 27.786 W119 28.015)Enjoy!
